name: Football Frenzy - FREE Sports Game
description:
Download the fun free football game that's addictive, exciting and great for football fans of all ages!

"Fun family football game!"

Olá Amigo! Help Felipe and his teammates win the football challenge!

They need you to collect enough medals and trophies to get them to the finals. Navigate the giant soccer balls across the field, jump to collect medals and bonus trophies and use the cannons to supercharge your speed.

Like all the top footballers, you'll need quick reflexes, fast thinking and superior skill to help them win!

Time is running out!

Obrigado! Thank you!

*Great Features Include*
- Addictive Game Play
- Awesome Graphics
- Unlock Football Powers
- Achievement Board
- Loads of Levels
- Endless Run Mode, Just Keep Going!
